name: Restoration Protocol
description:
Restoration Protocol requires two players to work together to find fertile soil and plant new seedlings. The area is hazard, thus we have a droid planting these seeds for us. One player controls the droid's movements, while the other player controls the radar system with a Stream Deck. Both players must figure out a way to best approach this situation, as one player can see the screen, whereas the other only has the Screen Deck to scan the area. 

ELGATO STREAMDECK REQUIRED TO PLAY.

STREAMDECK MUST BE PLUGGED IN BEFORE RUNNING GAME.

WINDOWS ONLY.
